subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In training camp, Yankees teammates flock to Mariano Rivera for guidance, and many of the lessons he imparts are from Chico Heron, the Yankees scout who found Rivera in 1990.
snippet: In training camp, Yankees teammates flock to Mariano Rivera for guidance, and many of the lessons he imparts are from Chico Heron, the Yankees scout who found Rivera in 1990.
